CustomField.inlineHelpText:
Youtube video Code.
To retrieve the YouTube video code from a YouTube URL, follow these steps:
1. Copy the full URL of the YouTube video you want to extract the code from. 2. Paste the URL into your web browser's address bar. 3. Look for the part of the URL after "v=". 4. The code following "v=" is the YouTube video code. In this example (https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=0vQO9RcEyJA), the YouTube video code is "0vQO9RcEyJA".
CustomField.label: Yuotube Code
